slides.title: Acceptance & Values
slides.content: ACT teaches accepting pain while taking action toward what matters most in your life

slides.title: Psychological Flexibility
slides.content: Learn to observe thoughts and feelings without being controlled by them

slides.title: Living with Purpose
slides.content: Focus on meaningful activities and values rather than waiting for pain to disappear

slides.title: Learn More
slides.content: Explore the comprehensive ACT manual for detailed techniques and exercises
